en: If checked, arrow keys move camera only;\notherwise, arrows navigate GUI controls
Toggle to show names or symbols, or hide both
Show/hide orbits and set their color
Show/hide points and set their color
Camera will maintain latitude & longitude with respect to the target object
Camera will track orbit of the target object
Camera follows the target object but orients to the ecliptic plane
Locks camera orientation with respect to reference frame: Ecliptic, Orbit or Ground
